dt2.7:1.5_0: manāyatanena ye dhammā sampayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi vippayuttā?
dt2.7:1.6_0: Te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.7:2.3_0: manoviññāṇadhātuyā ye dhammā sampayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.7:2.4_0: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi ekāya dhātuyā vippayuttā.
dt2.7:3.1_0: Manindriyena ye dhammā sampayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.7:3.2_0: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.7:4.1_0: Upekkhindriyena ye dhammā sampayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.7:4.2_0: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi pañcahi dhātūhi vippayuttā.
dt2.7:5.9_0: manasikārena ye dhammā sampayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.7:5.10_0: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.7:6.1_0: Adhimokkhena ye dhammā sampayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.7:6.2_0: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi ekāya dhātuyā vippayuttā.
dt2.7:7.1_0: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttehi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.7:7.2_0: upekkhāsahagatehi dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.7:7.3_0: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi pañcahi dhātūhi vippayuttā.
dt2.7:8.1_0: Savitakkasavicārehi dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.7:8.2_0: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi ekāya dhātuyā vippayuttā.
dt2.7:9.7_0: cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattīhi dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.7:9.8_0: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.7:10.2_0: savicārehi dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.7:10.3_0: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi ekāya dhātuyā vippayuttā.
dt2.7:11.1_0: Upekkhāsahagatehi dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi vippayuttā?
dt2.7:11.2_0: Te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi pañcahi dhātūhi vippayuttā.
